channel.title: native / changelog / stable
channel.description: changelog on the stable release channel

item.title: v2.5.8
item.description:
1. fix(core): remove preload animations (#1177)
  2. fix(keyboard): show controls on keyboard navigation (#1178)
  3. fix(playlist): respect e.defaultPrevented on ENDED event; (#1173)
  4. fix(keyboard): update live indicator and progress on left/right keys (#1169)

item.title: v2.5.7
item.description:
1. fix(util): fix elapsed time on the first throttle run (#1170)
  2. fix(ovp): prefer embed config always (#1166)
  3. feat: use async safe stacktraces during internal ERROR event
  4. fix(thumbnails): display correct thumb from sprite (#1156)
  5. fix(core): reduse fps for progress bar update (#1155)
  6. fix(ads): upgrade ads to 1.12.2
  7. fix: typo in additionalparameters gemius tracking
  8. fix: check navigator online status for hls errors

item.title: v2.5.5
item.description:
1. fix(qul): no ES6 support in IE11
  2. feat(chromecast): add more chromecast configuration keys (#1151)

item.title: v2.5.4
item.description:
1. fix(ovp): forward all ovp to ads macros
  2. fix(subtitles-html): single click on-off for single choice (#1135)
  3. feat: add trigger_cloud_tests task (#1143)

item.title: v2.5.3
item.description:
1. fix(ovp): ensure fetch_for_media_id is exported (#1138)
  2. feat(qul): add optional device_id parameter

item.title: v2.5.2
item.description:
1. fix(core): fix volume x button display (#1130)
  2. feat(ads): upgrade to 1.12.0
  3. feat(ads): upgrade to 1.11.0
  4. feat: extended gemius tracking
  5. feat(ads): upgrade to 1.10.7
  6. feat(qul): cache bust polling url
  7. feat(chromecast): add QUL support
  8. feat(qul): introduce QUL_ERROR
  9. fix(drm): update type signature for drm license forwarding (#1109)
  10. fix(dash): handle missing text track in stream manifest (#1105)
  11. fix(qul): fix QUL error handling

item.title: v2.4.0
item.description:
1. fix: iOS load() short-circuit was too greedy
  2. fix(core): ensure load() is called (#1087)
  3. fix(default): standard volume bar in rtl mode
  4. feat(core): add support for dir attr on player container
  5. fix: more precise error when http content in https context
  6. feat(ovp): use comp registry for livecountdown
  7. feat(core): add component registry
  8. fix(playlist): use togglePlay(true) (#1069)
